description: This file contains integration tests for the 'Gemini' model within the 'agno' project, focusing on multimodal input handling such as images, audio, and video, as well as image generation features.

methods.name: test_image_input
methods.description: Tests image input processing and response content verification.

methods.name: test_audio_input_bytes
methods.description: Tests audio input from bytes fetched from a URL and verifies response content.

methods.name: test_audio_input_url
methods.description: Tests audio input via URL and verifies response content.

methods.name: test_video_input_bytes
methods.description: Tests video input from bytes fetched from a URL and verifies response content.

methods.name: test_image_generation
methods.description: Tests image generation capability and verifies the generated image format.

methods.name: test_image_generation_streaming
methods.description: Tests streaming image generation and verifies images received in chunks.

methods.name: test_image_editing
methods.description: Tests image editing functionality with a sample image URL.

methods.name: test_image_generation_with_detailed_prompt
methods.description: Tests detailed prompt-based image generation and verifies the output.

methods.name: test_combined_text_and_image_generation
methods.description: Tests combined text and image generation responses.
